mechanisms.title: Case Seam Lip Pattern
mechanisms.summary: Reusable enclosure seam lip strategy from CadQuery examples.
mechanisms.prompt_block: Design enclosure top/bottom bodies with mating seam lip and assembly clearance. Keep wall thickness, lip depth, and seam overlap parametric.

mechanisms.title: Pillow Block Counterbore Pattern
mechanisms.summary: Pillow block profile with counterbored mounting holes.
mechanisms.prompt_block: Build a support block with central bore and counterbored fastener holes. Keep bore diameter, mounting spacing, and counterbore depth as named parameters.

mechanisms.title: Loft Transition Body Pattern
mechanisms.prompt_block: Create smooth loft transitions between section profiles with stable section ordering. Keep profile dimensions and section spacing parametric, and add conservative fillets only after validation.

mechanisms.title: Sweep Path Tube Pattern
mechanisms.summary: Sweep-based pipe/tube generation along guided path.
mechanisms.prompt_block: Generate a section swept along a path with controlled orientation and optional Frenet frame. Parameterize section size, bend radii, and path waypoint coordinates.

mechanisms.title: Revolve Profile Housing Pattern
mechanisms.summary: Axisymmetric revolve workflow for rotational components.
mechanisms.prompt_block: Create rotational components from constrained 2D profiles and revolve axis definitions. Keep profile dimensions, angle span, and bore dimensions parameterized.
